Package main.java

Class Promotions

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Promotions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    class Promotions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents a list of all the Promotions.
    Author:
    Eduardo Nunes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Promotions

        public Promotions()
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Constructor of the Promotions class that loads the promotions from the files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If we can't read the file.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If we can't find the class that we are trying to load.

    • Method Detail

      • loadpromos

        private void loadpromos()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Method that loads the Promotions from the files. It checks if the .obj file exists and if it does, it loads the promotions from it. If it doesn't, it loads the promotions from the default .txt file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If we can't read the file.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If we can't find the class that we are trying to load.

      • addPromotion

        private void addPromotion​(Promotion p)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method that adds a Promotion to the promotions list.
        Parameters:
        p - Promotion to be added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the promotion already exists in the current promotions list.

      • savepromotionsOBJ

        public void savepromotionsOBJ()
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Method that saves the current Promotions into to the .obj file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If we can't find the file.
        java.io.IOException - If we can't write to the file.

      • loadpromotionsOBJ

        private void loadpromotionsOBJ()
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                               java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Method that loads the Promotions from the .obj file and assigns them to the current promotions list.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If we can't read the file.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If we can't find the class that we are trying to load.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If we can't find the file.

      • loadpromotionstxt

        private void loadpromotionstxt()
                        throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
                               java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Method that loads the Promotions from the default .txt file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - In case we try to access an index that contains data that doesn't exist.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If we can't find the file.
        java.io.IOException - If we can't read the file.

      • checkPromotions

        public Promotion checkPromotions​(Order c)
        Method to check if at the date of a given Order there is a promotion that can be applied.
        Parameters:
        c - The Order that contains a Order.orderDate.
        Returns:
        The Promotion that can be applied or null, if there is no promotion that can be applied.

      • printPromotions

        public void printPromotions()
        Method to print all the promotions in the list.
